metadata.name: Comprehensive Personal Assistant & Project Manager
metadata.description: Advanced personal assistant workflow with comprehensive Notion integration for managing Projects & Tasks databases. Features intelligent task management, project orchestration, daily planning, and proactive assistance with real-time Slack interactions.

connections.conversion_function:
def convert(input_data: Dict[str, Any]) -> Dict[str, Any]:
    return {
        'user_input': input_data.get('message_text', '').replace('<@U0123456789>', '').strip(),
        'context': {
            'trigger_type': 'slack_mention',
            'user_id': input_data.get('user_id'),
            'user_name': input_data.get('user_name'),
            'channel_id': input_data.get('channel_id'),
            'channel_name': input_data.get('channel_name'),
            'thread_ts': input_data.get('thread_ts'),
            'trigger_time': input_data.get('trigger_time'),
            'execution_id': input_data.get('execution_id'),
            'slack_payload': input_data.get('slack_payload', {}),
            'automated': False,
            'original_message': input_data.get('message_text', '')
        }
    }

def convert(input_data: Dict[str, Any]) -> Dict[str, Any]:
    ai_response = input_data.get('extracted_data', {})
    slack_response = ai_response.get('slack_response', {})
    original_context = input_data.get('context', {})
    
    # Determine channel and thread settings
    channel = original_context.get('channel_id', '#assistant')
    thread_ts = original_context.get('thread_ts', '') if slack_response.get('thread_reply', False) else ''
    
    message_format = slack_response.get('format', 'text')
    message_text = slack_response.get('message', 'Task completed successfully! âœ…')
    
    # Add analysis summary if requested
    analysis = ai_response.get('analysis', {})
    if slack_response.get('include_summary', False) and analysis:
        workload = analysis.get('workload_assessment', 'moderate')
        insights = analysis.get('priority_insights', [])
        suggestions = analysis.get('suggestions', [])
        
        summary_text = f"\n\nðŸ“Š **Quick Summary**\nâ€¢ Workload: {workload.title()}\n"
        if insights:
            summary_text += f"â€¢ Key insight: {insights[0]}\n"
        if suggestions:
            summary_text += f"â€¢ Suggestion: {suggestions[0]}"
        
        message_text += summary_text
    
    result = {
        'message': message_text,
        'channel_override': channel,
        'metadata': {
            'source': 'ai_productivity_assistant',
            'trigger_type': original_context.get('trigger_type', 'unknown'),
            'execution_id': original_context.get('execution_id', ''),
            'user_id': original_context.get('user_id', ''),
            'automated': original_context.get('automated', False)
        }
    }
    
    # Add rich blocks if format is blocks
    if message_format == 'blocks' and slack_response.get('blocks'):
        result['blocks'] = slack_response.get('blocks', [])
    
    # Add thread timestamp if replying to thread
    if thread_ts:
        result['thread_ts'] = thread_ts
    
    return result
